title: Sole Omega in an Alpha Family
description: When I was young, I met Lee Jungin at the orphanage. We had the same name and birthday. The only difference was that he was the sole omega of a chaebol family. But after a car accident, I woke up in his body. “Take this body. It’s yours, Choi Jungin.” The moment Jungin saw this sentence on the very first line of a notebook he happened to find, his breath caught in his throat. We had joked about it before. Lee Jungin envied my freedom since I had no family, while I envied him for being wealthy and having siblings. But how…? How could this happen? He’s not a magician or a wizard; how can you just swap bodies at will? “It’s dangerous, child.” “Jungin, you need to be careful.” “Hey kid, let me take you to your room. Wrap your arms around my neck.” I’d heard that the alpha family considered Lee Jungin, born an omega, to be a disgrace, but his brothers’ behavior seemed a little strange. And that wasn’t the only odd thing. “Which bastard did this to you?” “Uh…” “I asked you, who messed with you, Lee Jungin?” Lee Jungin even had a fiancé—an extremely dominant alpha who treated him surprisingly well. “Jungin, tell me. Were all the things you said to me lies?” “Hey… Beomhyeon.” – Yeah? “Want to play a game?” With a self-deprecating smile, Jungin pressed the back of his hand against his hot eyes and asked: “Even if I were ugly, poor, without a family… Even if I were a beta… would you still like me?” – Yeah, I would have.” With trembling lips, Jungin closed his eyes as Beomhyeon’s steady voice, full of certainty, continued: – Don’t worry, Jungin. No matter what you look like or where you are, I’ll find you and love you more than anyone else in this world. The conversation with Beomhyeon gradually eased his anxious heart. – I love you, Jungin. I’ll take all your fears away, so you just keep smiling and be happy. Listening to the gentle voice whispering like a dream in his ear, Jungin fell into a deep sleep. For a very long time, until a new dawn, his phone remained turned off.  Modern, Omega Verse Strong Gong, Affectionate Gong, Devoted Gong, Tsundere Gong, Love Gong, Obsessed Gong, Crazy Gong, Chaebol Gong, Virile Gong, Handsome Gong Beautiful Soo, Affectionate Soo, Cheerful Soo, Foolish Soo, Pushover Soo, Outwardly Soft but Inwardly Strong Soo, Neat Soo, Chaebol Soo, Sickly Soo, Amnesiac Soo School/Campus, Friends to Lovers, First Love, Contract, Misunderstanding/Mistake, Politics/Society/Chaebol, Jealousy, Soul Swap, Mystery/Occult, Sweet, Screw-up, Daily Life, Healing

author: Songga

title: confidential
description: this content is a brand webtoon of the national intelligence service, telling the real spy experience of an ordinary college student by the author, sini and illustrator, gwangun.
author: sini

title: malhaneundareo
description: dreaming without goals, a typical high school senior, juhyun, lives day by day. one day, suddenly, everything she says starts to come true. she gains a special ability, but speaking freely is not as easy as it seems... here, her ordinary and repetitive daily life begins to twist little by little!
author: MuBeu

title: baski
description: a bank robbery case worth 30 billion won carried out by psychics. this incident triggers a man's struggle as his and his family's lives are turned upside down in an instant.
author: Jin Cheol-su

title: gosami ran away from home
description: 'i left home, but i didn't go wild' endless lies and misunderstandings, a suffocating chase the real runaway story of high school seniors before the college entrance exam!
author: Mitty

title: lotto 1st place goes to work
description: a common sales employee, gong euntae, who can be seen anywhere, wins the lottery jackpot he has always dreamed of! after tax, 1.8 billion won. it's a lot of money, but is it enough to turn his life around? “let's live as we have been…. i think of the lottery as insurance for my heart.” with solid insurance in hand, everything he does starts to go well?! euntae goes to work today too! with a different mindset than yesterday.
author: Seoinha

title: mary's burning happiness circuit
description: the gloomy high school girl yumeri lives with cheon hye-yoon, who was her mother's close friend, and his son cheon sa-hyun. sa-hyun, who is perfect in appearance, grades, and sociability, is truly the 'son of mom's friend.' will yumeri, who dreams of marrying sa-hyun and becoming a true family, be able to win his heart?
author: kim jisoo

title: orange moment
description: this content is a brand webtoon of hanwha eagles, delivered by writer geulha and illustrator eoksu. after experiencing numerous failures in job hunting, the place i finally got a job is hanwha eagles baseball team. yang hyejin, who knows nothing about baseball, faces a spectacular story of struggles to survive in the baseball team.
author: Geulha

title: muse on yumeong
description: my side job is a cleaning assistant, my main job is an unknown actor. ironically, my name is yumeong. on a particularly tough day, the unknown actor yumeong accidentally enters a master’s photo exhibition and sees his own photo. those photos captured the time when yumeong shone the brightest, and that image was the complete opposite of the current yumeong. can yumeong become a star as the muse of an unknown photographer?
author: Sujin

title: i want to be your woman
description: seong hayun's number one desired man, moon sin-hwi! though kind, sin-hwi is a fortress when it comes to romance, and the daring and audacious plans of hayun to win him over unfold. think short. act fast! a romance of struggle to breach the impregnable fortress.
author: tim agape

title: horror and romance
description: a horror writer who wants to know love and a popular romance writer who hates horror a chilling yet sweet romance production story
author: Lucid

title: selfish love theory
description: what about you? how do you feel when you see me happily with another man? 'yumin' and 'hyundo', both in their 30s, have broken up with their partners for some reason, but in reality, they are more attached than anyone else. with a selfish desire for their exes to hold onto them, the two come up with a 'plan'. that is, to fake date each other and provoke their exes! will their selfish and foolish plan succeed?
author: GyogyoBak

title: let's kidnap the male lead!
description:
i am vivian.
i have possessed a character in a novel written by my friend.
not just any character, but a supporting role who kidnaps and kills the male lead.
if i don't kidnap him, the world will end, so what can i do?
i'll kidnap the male lead and take good care of him to preserve my life!
i started with great determination, but... i don't even know the male lead's face.
ugh, i don't know.
one of the handsome guys must be the male lead!
but it seems like i accidentally kidnapped the villain and the female lead.
why are you guys coming out from there?
author: Jonan

title: let's get married
description: juhwan, the hotel heir, is facing a political marriage. three weeks before the engagement ceremony, he receives a proposal. not from his fiancée, but from another man. moreover, he was the younger brother of his fiancé. “you can’t marry my brother. i won’t let you.” it began to feel ominous that he would once again have the biggest escapade of his life with the one he had his first rebellion with in his teens.
author: Tongjorim

title: daechung campus romance im
description: a typical college student, hayun, unexpectedly encounters kangon during a trip. kangon falls for hayun at first sight and confesses, but hayun rejects him. they think they won't see each other again, but they reunite during the school club recruitment period..! oh? somehow they end up joining the club 'you', and wait, the president of 'you', jiil, likes hayun too?! lol this isn't a delusion. it's real.
author: Gongcheoljin

title: our oppa is an idol
description: is it the deokgye swamp?! the obsessive fan nam dareum gets a job at oppa's company!
author: Seongeun

title: cheongchun gyeseerok
description: the dangerous and thrilling cohabitation with the cult leader's son has begun! cheong-a, who was scammed by her uncle whom she trusted completely. her parents disappeared, chasing after her missing uncle, and cheong-a suddenly finds herself living alone in an empty house. but they are not the only family that got scammed! the largest cult in the district, 'cheonnyeonjaerimgyo', was also deceived by her uncle. and then the cult leader's son 'yohan' comes knocking at cheong-a's door, bringing his belongings with him...! oh god, is this cohabitation going to be okay?
author: Hanseo

title: call me a devil
description: during the day, 'hyeonsin' lives as a plastic surgeon, and at night, as a devil. with the power to seduce anyone with just a glance, she finds that her charms do not work on 'ina', who appears one day. instead, she calmly asks for breast surgery... who is this woman?

title: for the queendom
description: the demon abel loses his beloved brother, cain, to a human woman, yeonri. filled with rage, abel seeks out yeonri and finds himself struck by a love bullet, awakening a burning love for her... will he choose to take revenge for his brother? or will he choose a cruel love with his enemy?
author: Roseong

title: the story of nam living - the continuing trivial life
description: in life, which is a cauldron of confusion, there are many things i don't understand, but today, i just live slowly. watching the scenery outside the window with my cats, crying, laughing, eating, and drinking in my cozy life. this year marks the 20th anniversary of the serialization, a small and trivial story of nam.
author: Seonarae

title: goshisaengtoon
description: college entrance. a few years later. the shining youth of us who study.

title: oppa's meal
description: our school's popular boys group are someone's hopeless older brothers!? haeju, who hates being in the spotlight and seeks a quiet, unremarkable life, has older brothers who are so good-looking that they stand out just by walking. while hiding the fact that she is their sister, haeju attends school, but eventually gets found out... can haeju achieve her goals at a school with her older brothers?

description: a world where only those with innate talent can become adventurers who conquer dungeons. the world deemed 'nagi' as a porter who cannot become an adventurer. but if you clear the dungeon, isn't that being an adventurer? combat skill 0! survival ability max level! the all-purpose porter nagi's dungeon conquest story, defying fate!

title: Hevenly Demon who wants to be a chef
description: After the Monster Gate incident, Woojin awakens to memories of his past life. He was none other than the Heavenly Demon who once conquered the martial world! However, even in his past life as the Heavenly Demon, there was one dream he couldn't fulfill... This time, he is determined to make it come true—his dream of becoming a chef! The grand(?) story of former Heavenly Demon 'Chun Woojin' on his journey to becoming a chef!

title: the master of waves
description: two islands that appeared like a fantasy what greeted me there was a man with strange skin and red eyes.

description: since the first gate opened in 2018, landlords have survived for 20 years in a world where multiple dimensions are connected. upon the retirement ceremony the next day, he finds himself returning to 20 years ago with nothing…

description: people don't like to fight even if they can kill a bit. 'jerry', who never goes outside even in games. never fought before, but epic weapons are bound to him? virtual reality action rpg mob saga online. the drama of those who are deeply immersed.

title: mihoyagi
description: the first gumiho to appear in this world was a poor nine-tailed fox cursed with the ridiculous fate of having to eat her nine children to become human.

title: the place where the wind stays
description: a story of a girl who encounters the last dragon on earth one day

title: failed sage, life reversal with ur skill
description:
a world where 'dungeons' appear connected to another world.
people who awaken mysterious powers and defeat monsters to make a living are called 'adventurers'.
kirishima yuto gains the fraudulent job 'sage', but for some reason, his magic power is 0! 
he spends his days being disregarded as the weakest sage who cannot attack, and eventually gets abandoned by his companions and thrown into the dungeon as a sacrifice...
suddenly, a mysterious choice appears before him.
"would you like to execute?" 
upon answering that question, his abilities awaken, and the ur skill 'successor' is activated, allowing him to handle the techniques of past sages.
with the strongest skill in hand, the story of his growth into the strongest adventurer begins!

author: kim jinsu

title: singun
description: a boy who lost everything to a demon and is raised as prey. he grits his teeth and yearns for revenge, but human strength cannot reach the demon. then, the divine army appears before him. winner of the 2020 greatest contest 2nd phase encouragement award!

description: your scars, your two eyes, and... even your power! i will change everything from now on.

title: the otherworld class!
description:
despite being misunderstood as a bully due to his appearance, the soft-hearted choi gang-hee has the spirit of a fighting master grandmother possessing him?!
right after entering school, he became the top bully at igang high school, 'choi gang-hee'! everyone trembles and runs away when faced with his scary looks and fierce tone... but in reality, he was a kind-hearted boy whose wish was to make 100 friends!
one day, by chance, the spirit of his grandmother, who passed away 10 years ago, possesses him after he accidentally drops her urn...
the tumultuous school life of gang-hee unfolds with the spirit of the ultimate fighting grandmother! hidden grandmother's secret martial arts! let's go, gang-hee!!

title: the man who listens to stories
description: special rules of the escape room game, uncover the hidden past and truth of the guests. a man, sim woojae, who was forcibly hired as an 'assistant' at an escape room facility. he must help the guests who have been brought there and risk his life to escape. however, the assistants are given an additional secret mission to uncover the guests' past and truth... find out the stories they don't want to reveal. <the man who listens to stories>

title: deep

description: a boy who has isolated himself in a world of despair, but now he wants to go outside.

description: a mystery thriller involving the kidnapping of a child and five individuals unfolding in the afterlife

title: infection
description: a monster that eats people, 'the infected' i have become a monster.

title: habukpaengga maknaeadeul
description: the greatest power of habukpaengga, the king of the way, pengjihyeok. he heads to nakhogok to save his family, which has fallen into ruin due to the attack of the demon sect, but everything was a trap, and in the moment of death, he is enraged by the fact that he was abandoned by the family he loved. 'again... if i am given just one more chance...!' pengjihyeok, who was thought to be dead, awakens in the body of a fool, the son of habukpaengga.

title: mubeoljeon

description: a typical civil servant aspirant, hanseom, in the late joseon period. the path is not easy, but hanseom is not one to back down. will he be able to rise to a government position?

description: the emperor maintains the empire for a thousand years through iron-blooded politics via martial arts, leading to the survival of only the imperial martial arts as power and law, while classical martial arts fade away. reincarnated in this world is a martial arts novel enthusiast, the protagonist jang geon. can he truly revive the classical martial arts he has longed for? the essence of authentic martial arts unfolds in the western continent's development area!

title: jeoldaegeomgam
description: due to the destruction of his danjeon, so un-hwi was treated as a discarded child at home and lived as a third-rate spy even after being kidnapped by the blood cult. one day, while being used to find the legendary sword manual, un-hwi dies and returns to the day he was kidnapped by the blood cult ten years ago, gaining the mysterious ability to hear the voice of the sword.

title: grandpa warrior and the supreme granddaughter
description: as the day of death approaches, he was about to end his life without regrets when disaster struck! he decides to survive until his only granddaughter 'yuseol' grows up. while struggling with the tears of parenting and training in his already aged body, his granddaughter, born with the talent of a martial arts genius, is growing at an unbelievable pace. "don't worry, grandpa. now i'll protect you!"

description: after barely surviving the rebellion, juyunmun receives the heavenly demon, the greatest of the demon sect, and the sixth patriarch of shaolin, huineng, within him, and is reborn as 'pacheon', the heavenly demon's offspring... a new story of pacheon aiming for absolute supremacy begins!

"this comic will change its genre to school violence starting today!!"
